questions.question: What is the priest doing at the beginning of the play?

choices.answer: Sacrificing to the Sphinx.
Accusing Oedipus.
Asking Teiresias for help.
Asking the gods for help.

questions.question: Why is the priest doing this?

choices.answer: There is a plague on the city.
The Sphinx has attacked the city.
Oedipus asked him to.
It's a holiday.

questions.question: What does Oedipus announce that will happen if he finds the killer?

choices.answer: He will be put in jail.
He must be banished or killed.
He must become the next king.
He must be sacrificed to the Sphinx.

questions.question: What does Oedipus announce to the Theban people?

choices.answer: That if any man confesses, he will only be banished.
If anyone knows who killed Laius, he should come forward.
That he too will be punished if he helps the killer.
All of the above.

questions.question: Who is rumored to have killed King Lauis?

choices.answer: Teiresias.
Robbers.
Jocasta.
All of the above.

questions.question: Who does Creon advise Oedipus to send for?

choices.answer: The sphinx.
Teiresias.
A shepherd.
Jocasta.

questions.question: What does Teiresias say when he arrives?

choices.answer: That Jocasta murdered King Laius.
That he will not tell who killed King Laius.
That Creon murdered King Laius.
That the Sphinx killed King Laius.

questions.question: How does Oedipus respond when Teiresias charges him with killing Laius?

choices.answer: He accuses Teiresias of conspiring with Creon.
He accuses Creon of killing Laius.
He calls Teiresias a blind fool.
All of the above.

questions.question: What does Teiresias say will happen to Oedipus?

choices.answer: He will marry Antigone.
He will kill himself.
He will leave Thebes a blind beggar.
He will leave Thebes in triumph.

questions.question: Does Creon say he wants to be king?

choices.answer: Yes.
No.
Only if he can marry Jocasta.
Only if Oedipus rules with him.

questions.question: What does Jocasta convince Oedipus to do to Creon?

choices.answer: Kill him.
Forgive him.
Banish him.
Abandon him.

questions.question: What does Jocasta attempt to prove to Oedipus?

choices.answer: That there is no truth in prophecy.
That Teiresias is really his father.
That Creon killed Laius.
That the oracles are always right.

questions.question: What did King Laius do with his child?

choices.answer: He gave it to a maid to raise.
He left it exposed on a hill with its ankles pierced.
He sacrificed it on the altar of Athena.
He drowned it in the well.

questions.question: Where was King Laius killed at?

choices.answer: In his bath.
At the crossroads.
At the battle of Troy.
In jail.

questions.question: Why does Jocasta's story upset Oedipus?

choices.answer: He fought at Troy.
He killed a man at a crossroads.
He was witness to this death.
His father was killed in a similar way.

questions.question: What did the oracle tell Oedipus's parents?

choices.answer: That Oedipus would become blind.
That Oedipus should stay away from Thebes.
That Oedipus mother was Jocasta.
That Oedipus would kill his father and marry his mother.

questions.question: Why did Oedipus leave Corinth?

choices.answer: He was afraid of what the oracle said.
He was angry at the oracle.
He wanted to find his real dad.
He was summoned to kill the Sphinx.

questions.question: What news does the messenger bring from Corinth?

choices.answer: That Polybus is dead.
That Corinth wants Oedipus to be its king.
That Polybus was not Oedipus's father.
All of the above.

questions.question: What does Jocasta do in response of Oedipus finding the truth about himself?

choices.answer: She runs away to Corinth.
She talks to Oedipus and confesses her sins.
She talks to Teiresias and they find a solution for Oedipus.
She hangs herself in her bedroom.

questions.question: What does Oedipus do to himself after he finds Jocasta?

choices.answer: He calls his guards.
He blames Creon for what happened.
He scouts the city for the murderer.
He gouges his eyes out with her brooches.

questions.question: What does Oedipus do after he blinds himself?

choices.answer: He kills himself.
He goes to Teiresias and becomes a prophet.
He drinks an elixir that gives him his sight.
He goes to a mountain/cave to live the rest of his days.

questions.question: In Ancient Greece, actors wore huge outlandish costumes in order to

choices.answer: act better.
the best actors in Greece.
to be adored and liked.
be seen by the large audience.

questions.question: In Oedipus Rex, the climax is where

choices.answer: the city is burdened by a plague.
Oedipus gouges out his eyes.
Oedipus discovers the truth about himself and his parents.
Oedipus banishes himself to the mountain.

questions.question: In Oedipus Rex, the resolution is

choices.answer: Jocasta hangs herself.
Oedipus gouges out his eyes with Jocasta's brooches.
Oedipus blames Creon for the death of King Laius.
Oedipus banishes himself to the mountain.

questions.question: In Oedipus Rex, what is the exposition?

choices.answer: Jocasta kills herself.
Oedipus blames Creon for murdering King Laius.
The city is filled with a plague and a priest is praying.
Oedipus banishes himself to the mountain.

questions.question: In Oedipus Rex, what is the falling action?

choices.answer: Oedipus banishes himself to the mountain.
Oedipus discovers the truth about himself and his parents.
Jocasta hangs herself.
Oedipus gouges out his eyes with Jocasta's brooches.

questions.question: How was Oedipus "blind" during the beginning of the play?

choices.answer: He didn't know his cat died.
He didn't know he killed Enkidu.
He didn't know he killed his father.
He didn't know he was sleeping with his mother.

questions.question: Oedipus has

choices.answer: three daughters
three sons
two daughters
two sons

questions.question: What is ironic about Oedipus's blindness?

choices.answer: He was blind tothe truth until he physically blinded himself
He didn't become blind until he found out the truth

questions.question: Oedipus banishes himself to the mountain because he

choices.answer: was the one who spilled the pudding
was the one who couldn't save Enkidu from dying
was the one who killed King Laius
was the one who left the baby on the mountain
